text: Tamara Tunie (born March 14, 1959) is an American actress, director, and producer. She is best known for her roles as attorney Jessica Griffin on the CBS soap opera As the World Turns (1987-1995, 2000â€“2007, 2009), and as medical examiner Melinda Warner in the NBC police drama Law & Order: Special Victims Unit (2000-2019). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1959 births Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:Drama Desk Award winners Category:Tony Award winners Category:Living people Category:Actors from Pennsylvania
